Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles is looking to extend its three-game road winning streak.
The Rockets are struggling with a 32.5% three-point shooting percentage.
The Lakers are strong in fast break points, averaging 15.9 per game.
Others: Rockets injuries: Jae'Sean Tate (day-to-day illness), Tari Eason (day-to-day rest), Jabari Smith Jr. (out with a hand injury).
Lakers injuries: Jarred Vanderbilt (out with a knee injury), Gabe Vincent (day-to-day oblique), Christian Wood (out with a knee injury), Jalen Hood-Schifino (day-to-day hamstring).
